briefTitle: A Study to Determine the Dose Requirements of Rocuronium Bromide (ZemuronÂ®) in Pediatric and Adolescent Subjects (21048)(COMPLETED)(P05797)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Male and female subjects from birth up to 17 years of age who are scheduled for surgery with an anticipated duration of anesthesia of about 2 hours or more requiring a maintenance muscle relaxation dose(s).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects whose parent(s) or legal guardian(s) are not willing to give written consent and where applicable, subjects who have not given appropriate assent to participate in the trials will not be allowed to enter.

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Dose of Zemuron (Rocuronium) Administered
outcomeMeasures.description: Total dose from administration of intubating dose to reappearance of T3 (the third twitch of a Train of Four \[TOF\] stimulation) after the last maintenance bolus dose or discontinuation of Zemuron (rocuronium) infusion (Per protocol \[PP\] data set)

outcomeMeasures.title: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 Ratio (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) 70%
outcomeMeasures.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 70%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).

outcomeMeasures.title: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) Ratio 80%
outcomeMeasures.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 80%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).

outcomeMeasures.title: Duration of Recovery of T4/T1 (TOF Fourth Twitch to First Twitch) Ratio 90%
outcomeMeasures.description: The time it takes for the the T4 to T1 ratio to reach 90%. The T4/T1 ratio is indicative of recovery. At complete recovery, the T4/T1 ratio is 1.0 (100%).
